content: It's a great night for hockey in Pittsburgh!

In Pittsburgh, it's easy to get caught up in the excitement of hockey season. And, withPPG Paints Arenalocated right in the heart of Downtown Pittsburgh, it's even easier to see an electrifying game any night of the week.

Go to thePenguins Official Sitefor ticket information, game schedules, videos, podcasts, and more. And, be sure to visit theOfficial Penguins Store, your resource for hats, jerseys, collectives, and merch, all available online.
